value.description: The value to set the `NoGravity` flag to. If not set it'll change the value to the opposite of what it currently is.
value.markdownDescription: The value to set the `NoGravity` flag to. If not set it'll change the value to the opposite of what it currently is.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md).

Sets whether the entity is affected by gravity or not.

Type ID: `apugli:set_no_gravity`
